The user generates one or multiple lion-like [[sand]] creatures to attack or subdue a target. They appear to be easily dispersed if struck hard enough.

== Trivia ==
* The name of this technique refers to [[wikipedia:Shisa|Shisa]], a traditional Ryukyuan decoration, usually in pairs that resemble a cross between a lion and a dog in [[wikipedia:Okinawan mythology|Okinawan mythology]].
